mapper.select: SELECT user_no AS userNo, user_id AS userId, user_pw AS userPw, user_chr AS userChr, user_email AS userEmail, DATE_FORMAT(user_regdate, "%Y-%m-%d") AS userRegdate, file_name AS fileName FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.role_no AS roleNo, r.role_name AS roleName, r.role_desc AS roleDesc FROM user_tb u INNER JOIN user_role_tb ur ON u.user_no = ur.user_no INNER JOIN role_tb r ON r.role_No = ur.role_No WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_no AS userNo, u.user_id AS userId, u.user_pw AS userPw, u.user_chr AS userChr, u.user_email AS userEmail, DATE_FORMAT(u.user_regdate, "%Y-%m-%d") AS userRegdate, u.file_name AS fileName, r.role_desc AS roleDesc FROM user_tb u INNER JOIN user_role_tb ur ON u.user_no = ur.user_no INNER JOIN role_tb r ON ur.role_No =r.role_No
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb ( user_id, user_password, user_chr, user_email, file_name ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userChr}, #{userEmail}, #{fileName} )
